articles.title: 20 Palestinians killed at Gaza aid distribution site, says Israeli-backed aid group - AP News
articles.description: An American aid organization in Gaza says 20 Palestinians were killed at a distribution site in Khan Younis. The Gaza Humanitarian Fund said 19 died in a stampede, and one was fatally stabbed on Wednesday. The group accuses Hamas of spreading panic but provid…
articles.content: TEL AVIV, Israel (AP) Twenty Palestinians were killed Wednesday in the crush of a crowd at a food distribution site run by an Israeli-backed American organization in the Gaza Strip, the group said, t… [+4901 chars]

articles.title: Bank of America puts up mixed results as net interest income misses analysts' expectations - CNBC
articles.description: Bank of America put out a mixed quarter, exceeding estimates on EPS and missing on revenue and one of its main drivers, net interest income.
articles.content:
Bank of America on Wednesday posted mixed results for the second quarter, beating estimates on earnings and missing on revenue.
It was the only major U.S. bank to fall short on revenue for the quart… [+1963 chars]

articles.author: Richard Hollingham
articles.title: The handshake in orbit that made the International Space Station possible - BBC
articles.description: In 1975, a meet-up between American and Soviet spacefarers in orbit showed that the superpowers could work together. Its positive effects led to the International Space Station.
articles.content: Ben-Itzhak studies what she has termed "space blocs"  the emerging groupings of space nations. Right now, as countries plan a return to the Moon, it looks like the US and Russians will soon go their … [+275 chars]

articles.title: ‘American Idol’ producers mourn music supervisor killed in apparent double homicide - CNN
articles.description: Producers of the singing competition show “American Idol” are mourning the loss of music supervisor Robin Kaye.
articles.content:
Producers of the singing competition show American Idol are mourning the loss of one of their own.
